entry.title: Smelly London: visualising historical smells through text-mining, geo-referencing and mapping.
entry.summary:
Description

Filmed at PyData London 2017

Description Smelly London project brings together historical data with modern digitisation and visualisation to give us a unique, revealing and visceral glimpse into a London of the past and what it tells us about London today. This is a collaborative, interdisciplinary project to demonstrate the capabilities of innovative text mining tools we design to facilitate new kinds of humanities research.
